description.value:
Wondrous Item, Rare (Requires Attunement)
This cloak resembles a field of scattered stars and comets, sometimes shining with color and often in motion. While wearing this cloak, you are immune to spells of 1st to 3rd level, both beneficial and harmful spells. Spells targeting you simply seem to be absorbed and disappear into its fabric.
